news_header: Brookline Bancorp reported $91.58 million in revenue for Q4 2024, with an EPS of $0.23, showing a slight decline compared to last year.
news_text: Brookline Bancorp (BRKL) reported $91.58 million in revenue for the quarter ended December 2024, reflecting a year-over-year decline of 0%. The EPS for this period was $0.23, down from $0.26 a year ago. The reported revenue was slightly below the Zacks Consensus Estimate of $92.24 million, resulting in a surprise of -0.72%. The company also had an EPS surprise of -4.17%, with the consensus estimate being $0.24. Investors often look at year-over-year changes in revenue and earnings to guide their decisions, and key metrics provide deeper insights into the company's performance.
